heroHook: Carlos stared at the empty ChatGPT chat window. Twenty minutes ago, she'd been deep in a productive conversation about product descriptions. Now? Blank slate. No memory. No context. Same project, same person, completely different AI — or at least that's how it felt. This is the "chatgpt to notion extension" problem, and it affects every serious AI user.
